issue.title: [Python] Support __eq__ on scalar values
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2253](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2253). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Support a generic `__eq__` method the `ArrayValue` class. We might want to specialise it in the future in C++ to avoid some copies but as a first attempt delegate the comparison to the Python types.
